segments.text: From where I'm looking, the kitchen seems peaceful with the window open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then my eyes catch the sink overflowing with water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's shocking how much is spilling out onto the counter and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying the plate has no idea; she's completely tuned out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress make her look so proper amid the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, the boy is on a stool that's starting to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh gosh, he's reaching into the cookie jar way up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll crash down hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is reaching too, like she doesn't see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is nerve-wracking; my heart is racing just watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside couldn't be calmer, which makes it worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices before an accident happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
